name: Mayday Squad Heroes
overview: The "Red Legion" terrorist organization took possession of the Lutheran embassy, but without capturing the ambassador's daughter who managed to hide somewhere inside. The terrorists threaten to blow up the entire embassy if their unacceptable requests are not satisfied within a certain time. Three members of the " Mayday team", formed by experienced fighters, infiltrate the building with the mission of rescuing the girl and eliminating the leaders of the Red Legion before it is too late.
